it:description.html:p: Google Search is a web search engine developed by Google LLC. It is the most widely used search engine on the World Wide Web and is designed to provide relevant search results quickly and accurately.

Google Search can be done in several ways
Search by key words
Search by URL
Voice search
Photo search
Google Maps is a web mapping service developed by Google. It provides interactive maps, satellite imagery, and route planning for users around the world.

It is possible to switch between different map layers
Default
Satellite
Terrain
Google Chrome is a web browser developed by Google. It is known for its speed, simplicity, and security features.

Google Chrome works in 2 modes
Usual mode
Incognito mode
